snippet.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Click download and let the battle begin! 

App Store: http://bit.ly/warhammer40kspacewolf
Google Play: http://bit.ly/SpaceWolf-GP

Lead the Sons of Russ into battle and slash your way through hordes of ferocious enemies with Boltgun fire and Chainsword teeth. Write your own saga in the annals of the Space Wolves Chapter as you hunt your sworn enemies – the Chaos Space Marines.  

Game features:

- An epic single player campaign, Combat the Word Bearers and defeat the unrelenting enemies of the Space Wolves;
- Select your main hero for each mission, to best match your own style, strategy and tactics; 
- 14 different unlockable perks to choose for each class;
- Unlock all five companions and choose two to take into battle with you;
- Victories unlock powerful new weapons, bonuses and tactics cards - collect and evolve them.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/40kspacewolf
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/40kspacewolf
VK: https://vk.com/wh40000sw
HeroCraft Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/herocraft.games
